Class FileManager

java.lang.Object
com.hado90.fileMgt.FileManager
public class FileManager extends Object
This class provides a facade for file management utilities and extractors. It simplifies the creation, registration, and use of extractors for different file types, as well as providing common file operations such as creating folders, moving files, deleting files and folders, and extracting files from archives.

  • Constructor Details

    • FileManager

      public FileManager(String[] extractorTypes)
      Constructor that initializes the file utility and registers extractors based on the provided types.
      Parameters:
      extractorTypes - an array of extractor types to be registered.

  • Method Details

    • getExtractor

      public Extractor getExtractor(String type)
      Retrieves the extractor for a specific type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of extractor to retrieve (e.g., "zip").
      Returns:
      the Extractor object for the given type, or null if not found.

    • registerExtractor

      public void registerExtractor(String type, Extractor extractor)
      Registers an extractor for a specific file type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of extractor (e.g., "zip").
      extractor - the Extractor object to be registered.

    • createFolder

      public void createFolder(String folderPath)
      Creates a folder in the specified directory path.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - the path where the folder should be created.

    • fileOrDirectoryExists

      public boolean fileOrDirectoryExists(String filePath)
      Checks if a file or directory exists at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to check.
      Returns:
      true if the file or directory exists, false otherwise.

    • deleteFile

      public void deleteFile(String filePath)
      Deletes the file at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      filePath - the path to the file to be deleted.

    • deleteFolder

      public void deleteFolder(String folderPath)
      Deletes the folder and its contents (files and subdirectories) at the specified path.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - the path of the folder to be deleted.

    • moveFile

      public void moveFile(String inputFilePath, String outputFilePath)
      Moves a file from one location to another.
      Parameters:
      inputFilePath - the path of the file to move.
      outputFilePath - the destination path for the file.

    • wipeFolderContents

      public void wipeFolderContents(String folderPath)
      Deletes all files from the specified folder, but leaves the folder intact.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - the path of the folder to wipe.

    • getDirectoryContents

      public List<String> getDirectoryContents(String directoryPath)
      Retrieves the contents of a specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path of the directory to scan.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths in the directory.

    • filterDirectoryContentByTypes

      public List<String> filterDirectoryContentByTypes(String[] types, List<String> directoryContentPaths)
      Filters the contents of a directory based on the specified file types.
      Parameters:
      types - the file extensions to filter by (e.g., "zip", "txt").
      directoryContentPaths - the list of file paths to filter.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths that match one of the specified types.

    • getFileExtensionFromPath

      public String getFileExtensionFromPath(String inputPath)
      Retrieves the file extension from a given file path.
      Parameters:
      inputPath - the path to the file.
      Returns:
      the file extension (e.g., "txt"), or an empty string if no extension is found.

    • getSubdirectoryPaths

      public List<String> getSubdirectoryPaths(String directoryPath)
      Retrieves the paths of all subdirectories within a specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path of the directory to scan.
      Returns:
      a list of subdirectory paths, or an empty list if no subdirectories are found.

    • getSubdirectoryFiles

      public List<String> getSubdirectoryFiles(String directoryPath)
      Retrieves all files, including those in subdirectories, within a specified directory.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path of the directory to scan.
      Returns:
      a list of file paths within the directory and its subdirectories.

    • extract

      public String extract(String archivePath, String destinationPath) throws IOException
      Extracts the contents of an archive to the specified destination folder.
      Parameters:
      archivePath - the path to the archive file.
      destinationPath - the destination folder where the extracted files will be placed.
      Returns:
      the path to the folder where the files were extracted.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during extraction.

    • extract

      public String extract(String archivePath) throws IOException
      Extracts the contents of an archive to a default destination folder.
      Parameters:
      archivePath - the path to the archive file.
      Returns:
      the path to the folder where the files were extracted.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs during extraction.
